      • getUUID

        public java.util.UUID getUUID()
                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Description copied from interface: IUser
        Get UUid of the user, which is a unique identifier for the user. The UUID value of the user must equals the UUID value of all receivers belonging to this user.
        Specified by:
        getUUID in interface IUser
        Returns:
        uuid of the user
        Throws:
